T11n2992u_001:1649: kuta ityāha- na hītyādi samba- ndhanirapekṣasya pratyāyane'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1651: yadi svasambandhadvāraṁ muktvānyathākārā- ntareṇāpi svārthaṁ pratyāyayituṁ śaktiḥ syāt na tu svasambandhānu- rūpeṇeti yāvat |
T11n2992u_001:1656: tato na nimittanaimittikabhāva evaiko vyañjako vakta- vyaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1663: (107) uktaṁ prāgiti vyarthaḥ so'pyanyato gaterityanenāyamarthaḥ prāgevoktaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1665: yadyubhayor nimi- ttanaimittikayor gamakatvaṁ syāt yujyetaivaṁ vaktum |
T11n2992u_001:1666: na cobhayor gama- katvam api tu naimittikasyaiva |
T11n2992u_001:1671: yena pravṛttinimittena tatra nimittaśabdaḥ pravarta- te tan nimittatvam |
T11n2992u_001:1673: atrāpi sādhyasya yoṁ'śo gamyaḥ tan naimittikatvam |
T11n2992u_001:1674: ka- smāt punar naimittikatvaṁ na vyañjakamityāha - vyaṅgyatvāditi sā- dhyatvādityarthaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1675: siddhasya hi gamakatvaṁ bhavati na sādhyasya |
T11n2992u_001:1676: tasmān nimittabhāva ityeva vaktavyam na tu nimittanaimittikabhāva iti ||
T11n2992u_001:1677: syādetat - naivaṁ vijñāyate - nimittanaimittikayor bhāvo nimitta- naimittikabhāva iti |
T11n2992u_001:1678: evaṁ hi vijñāyamāne naimittikagrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt nimittabhāvasyaiva gamakatvāt |
T11n2992u_001:1679: kathaṁ tarhi nimittasya naimitti- kena bhāva iti |
T11n2992u_001:1682: mittamityabhidhānaṁ pratyayaś ceti kṛtvā nimittabhāva itīyatyucyamāne na jñāyate - kena saha nimittabhāvo'vinābhāvalakṣaṇa iti |
T11n2992u_001:1684: naitadasti nimittasya hi niyamena naimittikāpekṣatvādevamanucya- māne'pi pratiyogipratipattiriti naimittikagrahaṇaṁ niṣphalam |
T11n2992u_001:1691: sahacaribhāve ca sambandhe pradhānānva- yādīnāṁ naitac cheṣavad yujyate |
T11n2992u_001:1692: na hi sahacaribhāvaḥ kāryakāraṇabhā- vaḥ pṛthag nirdeśāt |
T11n2992u_001:1693: kiṁ ca dvayor hi vyavasthitayoḥ sahacaribhāvo bhavati cakravākavat |
T11n2992u_001:1694: na ca kāryakāraṇayor yogapadyaṁ samasti kārya- kāle kāraṇasya tirobhāvāt |
T11n2992u_001:1698: sa sahacaribhāve sambandhe na yujyata ityabhyupetaṁ hīyate |
T11n2992u_001:1702: tatra viśeṣadṛṣṭam yadāgnidhūmasambandhaṁ dṛṣṭvā tenaiva dhūmena tasyaivāgneḥ punaḥ punarastitvaṁ pratipadyate - sa evāyamagni- riti |
T11n2992u_001:1703: sāmānyato dṛṣṭam yat kvacid dhūmāgnisambandhaṁ dṛṣṭvottarakālaṁ dhūmamātradarśanādagnisāmānyānumānam |
T11n2992u_001:1704: etadapi sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanu- mānaṁ dvividham- pūrvavac cheṣavac ca |
T11n2992u_001:1705: tatra pūrvavat yadā kāraṇama- nyūnaṁ dṛṣṭvā bhaviṣyattvaṁ kāryasya pratipadyate |
T11n2992u_001:1706: tad yathā meghodayaṁ dṛṣṭvā bha- viṣyattvaṁ vṛṣṭeḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1707: śeṣavat yadā kāryanirvṛttiṁ dṛṣṭvā bhūtatvaṁ kāraṇasya pra- tipadyate |
T11n2992u_001:1708: tad yathā navavṛddhajalāṁ nadīṁ dṛṣṭvā bhūtatvaṁ meghasya |
T11n2992u_001:1709: tatra pūrva- vadanumānaṁ vyabhicāri śeṣavat savicāramavyabhicāri |
T11n2992u_001:1710: teṣāṁ yadeta- t sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanumānaṁ śeṣavat eṣa heturatīndriyāṇāṁ bhāvā- nāṁ samadhigama iti ||
T11n2992u_001:1712: anena - yat pūrvā- nubhūtaṁ tadevedamiti pratyavamṛśati tat smṛtyātmakam yathā sa e- vāyaṁ dhūma iti jñānam |
T11n2992u_001:1715: sāmānyato dṛṣṭameva dvividhamityava- dhāraṇasya hyanyadvaividhyavayavacchedaḥ phalam |
T11n2992u_001:1716: tataś ca kāryakāraṇā- bhyāṁ punaḥ punaranumānābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ punaḥ punaranumānaṁ viśeṣadṛṣṭami- ti kṛtvetyabhyupetahāniḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1717: athetyevamādināpyabhyupetahānimevāha ya- smāt sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṁ dvividhamevetyavadhāraṇasya saṅkhyāntaravyudāsaḥ phalam |
T11n2992u_001:1720: kasmāt sāmānyato dṛṣṭābhāva ityāha- na hyeṣu kāryakāraṇabhāvo'stīti |
T11n2992u_001:1723: dvitīyādiṣu kṣaṇeṣu viśeṣagrahaṇaṁ sa- mbhavati sa evāyamiti tadbhāvākhyeti viśeṣagrahaṇāt na tu prathame kṣaṇe ||
T11n2992u_001:1726: e- (111) kas tuśabdo yasmādarthe dvitīyas tasmādarthe |
T11n2992u_001:1727: yasmād dvividhamevā- numānam tasmāt prathamato'numeyādhigame svasvāmyādibhis tribhir yad anumānatrayam tat kva viniveśyatām naiva kvacit tasyā- ntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1732: anayā diśā sahacaribhāvavadhyavadhakasambandhayorapi kāryakāraṇa- bhava unnīyata iti pṛthag noktaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1733: tathā hi- na vinopakāreṇa sahaca- ribhāvo'sti cakravākayor maithunasukhopasaṁhārādinā parasparopakā- radarśanāt |
T11n2992u_001:1734: vadhyavadhakabhāvo'pyahijayanakulaparājayayoḥ kāryakāra- ṇabhāva eva parasparahetutvāt sattvādīnāmiva śabdādibhāvena pariṇa- tau ||
T11n2992u_001:1740: saptabhirapi sambandhairanumāne kartavye pratyāyyapratyāya- kābhyāṁ sambandhibhyāṁ kṛtaḥ parasparasyānyatarasya vā yathāsambhavamupa- kāro vidyato
T11n2992u_001:1741: anyathā tayoḥ sambandha eva na syāt ||
T11n2992u_001:1747: asmin vyākhyāne yadetac codyam- nanu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyāyanāyāśrīyate |
T11n2992u_001:1749: tat kathaṁ sa e- vopakāra ityucyata iti tasyāvatāra eva nāsti yato nātra pratyā- yanamupakāro'bhisaṁhitaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1756: nanu cāviditadvai- vidhyapratipādanameva vākyasya phalaṁ syāt |
T11n2992u_001:1759: arthāntaravyavacchedena hi tatsvarūpaṁ pratīya- te svabhāvāntaravyāvṛttarūpatvāt tasya |
T11n2992u_001:1760: rūpāntaraṁ cena na vyavacchi- nnam kutas tatsvarūpapratītiḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1767: liṅgyata iti gamyata ityarthaḥ nātropacāro yukta iti upacāra- nibandhanasyābhāvāt |
T11n2992u_001:1769: yo hi kiñcit kāraṇamupajanita- kāryaṁ dṛṣṭvānyadapi tajjātīyaṁ paśyan sādṛśyaskhalitamatiretadapi ni- yataṁ tat kāryaṁ janayiṣyatītyadhyavasyati tasya kāraṇāt kāryajñānaṁ bhavati |
T11n2992u_001:1772: yasmāt kadācin na bhavati tasmād vyabhicārītyucyate |
T11n2992u_001:1776: naiva hi sa tadānumānamiti yo'sāvayathārthaḥ pratyayaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1779: ato nāsti tade- kam yadanumānaṁ syād vyabhicāri ca ||
T11n2992u_001:1781: tathā hi- vaktāro bhavanti - yadanenānumānamupanyastam tan mayā dūṣitamityapi ca- vyabhicārīti |
T11n2992u_001:1783: yadi kāryakāraṇajñāne satyapi punas tato'dhikaṁ vya- bhicāryavyabhicāritvamapekṣyate sambandhāntaramāgatamityabhyupeta- hānam ||
T11n2992u_001:1788: atha niyamārthaṁ tad vacanam evamapi - sāmānyataḥ khalvapītyāderānarthakyaṁ syā- t ||
T11n2992u_001:1791: kāryakāraṇasambandhe hyanumitihetutvenābhyupete liṅgasvarūpameva vicāra- yituṁ yuktam - kimidaṁ kāryaṁ syān na syāditi |
T11n2992u_001:1793: tatra hi svarūpagata eva vicāraḥ - kimayaṁ nadīpūro vṛṣṭikṛta āhosvin neti |
T11n2992u_001:1794: yadā tvasau phenakalilapāṁsulodakādibhiś cihnair niścitasvarūpo bhavati tadā na punaravyabhicāritve vicāramapekṣyate |
T11n2992u_001:1795: na hi vṛṣṭikāryatve niścite tatra vyabhicāritvamāśaṅkyate kāryasya kāra- ṇāvyabhicārāt |
T11n2992u_001:1798: nanu ca naivamavadhāryate - sāmānyato dṛṣṭamevātīndriyārthadarśana- heturiti kathaṁ tarhi - sāmānyato dṛṣṭamatīndriyārthopalabdhihetureveti
T11n2992u_001:1801: sarveṣāṁ hyanumānānāmapratyakṣādhigamahetutvāt sāmānyato dṛṣṭasyāpi tadadhigamahetutvaprāptau punarvacane tadviparītapratiṣedharupo ni- yamo vijñāyate pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā iti yadvat |
T11n2992u_001:1804: tad yathā - kṛṣṇā gavāṁ sampannakṣīrata- meti kṛṣṇāyā eva sampannakṣīratamatvam ||
T11n2992u_001:1806: tadbhāvamātre- ṇa hi pradhānaṁ bhedahetuḥ naikatvādibhir dharmaiḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1808: hyupajanaḥ pratiṣidhyate vikāraṇām- nedaṁ vyaktamasata utpadyata iti |
T11n2992u_001:1810: sadrūpānuvidhā- nāc ca bhedānāṁ sadrūpameva kāraṇam |
T11n2992u_001:1812: na tu sattāsaṁsargakṛtam sattāyāḥ prāk pariṇāmādasa- mbhavāt |
T11n2992u_001:1814: yathā ca tadā sattā nāsti tathaikatvādayo'pi |
T11n2992u_001:1818: yadyevam kathaṁ taduktam- na ca kaścit pradhānasya bhedo nirvartako na ca ityādi |
T11n2992u_001:1820: yadi paro'nanyatvamaṅgīkṛtya pradhānapuruṣārthagatān daśa cūlikārthān sādhayet sarvathā gatiḥ syāt |
T11n2992u_001:1821: idaṁ tu svābhiprāyeṇa - tatsadbhāvasyaiva kāraṇatvaṁ yuktamiti kṛtvā ||
T11n2992u_001:1825: bhedenābhedena veti sattvena vaikenākartṛka- tvādibhir vā atha vaikena vā vītena pañcabhir vā atha vā yadi puru- ṣādastitvādayo bhinā athāpyabhinnāḥ sarvathānavagama ityabhyupeta- hāniḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1826: yadakāraṇam na tac cheṣavadanumānāvaseyam atyantābhāva- vat |
T11n2992u_001:1829: ye tu - śabdākārapariṇate- ndriyavṛttinirbhāsāyāṁ manovṛttāvupajātāyāṁ puṁso'pi tadākāravṛttiru- pajāyate tasmād vṛttyākārapariṇāmī puruṣa itīcchanto'siddhatāṁ hetorudbhāvayanti teṣāṁ pradhānarūpaḥ pumān prapnoti |
T11n2992u_001:1833: evaṁ ca vṛttivṛttimatorananyatvāt puṁso'pi tri- guṇātmakatvamāpannam |
T11n2992u_001:1834: triguṇasvabhāvatvāc ca so'pi pradhānameva syā- t |
T11n2992u_001:1840: yathā pratyakṣaṁ dharmaṁ pratyanimitta- m tathānumānādīnyapi |
T11n2992u_001:1845: coda- nālakṣaṇo dharmaḥ na pratyakṣādilakṣaṇa iti jñāpayitum |
T11n2992u_001:1846: pratyakṣasya ca dharmaṁ pratyanimittatve jñāpite - anyadapi yat pratyakṣapūrvam tad dharm- parijñānanimittaṁ na bhavatīti jñāyata eveti kiṁ tena sūtritena ||
T11n2992u_001:1847: kathaṁ tarhi ṣaṭ pramāṇāni mīmāṁsāyāṁ pratītyānītyāha - vṛttikā- rairityādi ||
T11n2992u_001:1849: nanu ca sūtre pratyakṣapūrvakatvamasūtritatve he- tutvenopāttam |
T11n2992u_001:1850: vṛttau tu pramāṇatvaparijñāne - yadi yat pratyakṣapūrvaka- m tat pramāṇatvena vijñāsyata ityabhidhānāt tat kathaṁ vṛtteḥ sū- trārthānugamanam
T11n2992u_001:1851: sūtre pratyakṣapūrvakatvamasūtraṇasya pāramparyeṇa hetutveno- pāttam na sākṣāt |
T11n2992u_001:1852: tadeva ca pāramparyaṁ darśayitum- yadi yat pra- tyakṣapūrvakamityādikaṁ vivaraṇaṁ kṛtamityadoṣaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1855: tataś ca - smṛtīcchādveṣayatnādi pramāṇamanuṣajyata itya- sya dūṣaṇasyāvatāro na syāt |
T11n2992u_001:1857: nanu naiva mīmāṁsāyāṁ pratyakṣapūrvakatvena pramāṇatvamuktam api tu dharmaṁ pratyanimittatvameṣāmākhyātam yadāha- pratyakṣapūrvakatvāc cānu- mānopamānārthāpattīnāmapyakāraṇatvamiti |
T11n2992u_001:1859: pratyakṣādīni hi pramāṇāni prasiddhānīti naiṣa do- ṣaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1860: iha prasiddhatvaṁ nāsti teṣāmiti jñāpitametat - bahavaś ca vi- pratipannā ityanena |
T11n2992u_001:1861: na ca teṣāṁ lakṣaṇamuktam yataḥ svarūpāvasāyaḥ syāt |
T11n2992u_001:1862: pratyakṣapūrvakatvāc ca dharmaṁ pratyanimittatānumānādīnāṁ vijñā- yata eva |
T11n2992u_001:1863: tato noktānīti vṛttikārair vākyakārābhiprāyamudbhāvayadbhiḥ - pratyakṣapūrvaṁ yat tat pramāṇatvena vijñāyata eva |
T11n2992u_001:1864: tato noktānītya- yamapyabhiprāya utprekṣita iti sambhāvyate |
T11n2992u_001:1866: na hyavijñāya pramāṇāntarāṇāṁ svarūpaṁ dharmaṁ pratyanimi- ttatā śakyā vijñātum yataḥ svarūpaparijñānārthaṁ vaktavyāni syuḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1868: tasmān nūnam- yat pratyakṣapūrvakam tat pramāṇatvena vi- (120)
T11n2992u_001:1870: tato noktānītyayamapi vṛttikārair vākyakārābhiprā- yo'bhyūhita ityāśaṅkyate |
T11n2992u_001:1871: tataś ca smṛtyādīnāmapi pratyakṣapūrvaka- tvāt pramāṇatvaṁ prasajyata iti ||
T11n2992u_001:1879: sambandhaś cānekāśraya ityādinā sādhāraṇatvaṁ sambandhasya darśayan- yat sādhāraṇam na tat pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ sāmānyavat |
T11n2992u_001:1880: tathā ca sambandha iti vyāpakaviru- ddhamudbhāvayati |
T11n2992u_001:1889: yadi sambandhinaḥ saṁyogisamavāyyāditvena sambandhirūpeṇa gṛhyante evamanumānādyupakāriṇo bhavanti |
T11n2992u_001:1892: anyathā yo'pyanagnisambandhitvena prathamamavyutpannāgni- dhūmasambandho dhūmaṁ gṛhṇāti tasyāpi tato'gneranumānaṁ syāt |
T11n2992u_001:1893: na ca te tathā pratyakṣā iti sambandhāpekṣatvāt sambandhitvasya sambandhasya cāpratyakṣatvāt |
T11n2992u_001:1894: arthālocanamātratvāc cendriyadhiyaḥ sandhānaṁ pratya- sāmarthyāt sambandhirūpeṇa grahaṇaṁ pratyakṣeṇa teṣāṁ na sambhavati ||
T11n2992u_001:1896: dṛṣṭam yatra liṅgaliṅginoḥ sa- mbandho dṛṣṭaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1897: sāmānyato dṛṣṭam yatra kvacit sambandhadarśanāt ta- tsāmānyākāreṇātīndriyārthādhigatiḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1899: tatretyādinā - samavāyādīnāṁ tadvatāṁ ca sama- vāyyādīnāṁ samavāyasamavāyyādirūpeṇāpratyakṣatvābhyupagamāt parama- tenāpi tadāśrayasyānumānasya pratyakṣapūrvakatvaṁ nāstīti darśayati |
T11n2992u_001:1905: caśabdo bhinnakramo'vadhāraṇārthaś ca draṣṭavyaḥ naiva heturityarthaḥ ||
T11n2992u_001:1908: tataś cobhayorapyagnidhūmayor gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt sarvathā ca sarvātmanā saṁyogāt ||
T11n2992u_001:1914: sambandhirūpeṇa tarhi ta- yor adhigatayorupakāro bhaviṣyatītyāha- na cetyādi |
T11n2992u_001:1915: na hī- ndriyadhiyo yogo viṣayo nāpi tadyuta ityanena - saṁyogirūpeṇa saṁyoginoḥ pratyakṣatā na bhavatītyuktam ||
T11n2992u_001:1917: lakṣaṇaṁ tu te - ṣāṁ yadiṣṭam tadanavadyam yatas tasya pratiṣedho nocyata ityāha- anumānopadeśopamānāmityādi |
T11n2992u_001:1918: kathaṁ punaḥ svābhiprāyeṇa nokta- mityāha- sambandhāntarasyānirdeśāditi |
T11n2992u_001:1919: na hi vaiśeṣikādyabhima- tasambandhebhyo'nyaḥ kaścana sambandho nirdiṣṭaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1920: yadapīdaṁ śabareṇa svābhiprāyeṇa kilānumānamuktam - anumānaṁ jñātasambandhasyaikadeśa- darśanādekadeśāntare'sannikṛṣṭe buddhiḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1922: sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṁ ceti tadapi vaiśeṣikīyānumānameva yadi ta eva sa- mbandhā vivakṣitāḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1923: athānye teṣāṁ svarūpaṁ na nirdiṣṭamityanirdiṣṭame- vānumānam |
T11n2992u_001:1924: smṛtirapi caikadeśadarśanādekadeśāntare pūrvādhigate jāya- ta iti sāpyanumānaṁ syāt |
T11n2992u_001:1927: arthāpattyabhavayos tu pratiṣedha ucyata iti tayoḥ svābhiprā- yeṇa vidhānāt ||
T11n2992u_001:1929: ekenādiśabdena cūrṇīda- rvyādayaḥ sādhanaviśeṣā gṛhyante dvitīyena codakopasaṁhārādayo vyā- pāraviśeṣāḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1931: na hi tair vi- nā pākaniṣpattir bhavati |
T11n2992u_001:1933: kathaṁ punaranumānam yāvatā trirūpāl liṅgato'rthadṛg anu- mānamuktamityāha- pacatiliṅgādeva gamyata iti |
T11n2992u_001:1937: (124) anye tu bhāvābhāvābhyāṁ kāryakāraṇapratipattimarthāpattim iccha- nti tāmevānye yuktyākhyaṁ pramāṇāntaramiti |
T11n2992u_001:1938: yathā sati cakṣuṣi ca- kṣurvijñānaṁ bhavati asati na bhavati |
T11n2992u_001:1943: tathā hi - yadapīdaṁ bījāṅkurādi dṛṣṭāntatveneṣyate tatrāpyanenaiva siddhaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1944: na caitad yuktam yenaiva sādhyaṁ sādhyate tenaiva dṛ- ṣṭānto'pīti nidarśanānavasthāprasaṅgāditi |
T11n2992u_001:1948: na ca tenaiva tasya sādhyatvamupapa- dyate |
T11n2992u_001:1949: tasmādatra mūḍhaṁ prati jananakhyātyā pitṛtvavad viṣayadarśanene vi- ṣayiṇo vṛttasambandhasya smaraṇād vyavahāraḥ sādhyate |
T11n2992u_001:1950: yādṛśe viṣaye tvayānyatra kāryakāraṇavyavahāraḥ pravartitaḥ tādṛśa evāyam |
T11n2992u_001:1952: vyavahāre ca sādhye sambhavati dṛṣṭānta itya- numānameva |
T11n2992u_001:1953: prayogas tu- yatra tadbhāvabhāvitvam tatra kāryakāraṇavya- vahāraḥ kartavyaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1954: tad yathā yatra pūrvaṁ pravartitaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo bī- jāṅkurādau |
T11n2992u_001:1956: (125) śabaras tvāha- arthāpattirapi dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho'nyathā nopapadyata ityarthaparikalpanā yathā jīvati devadatte gṛhādarśanena bahirbhāva- syādṛṣṭasya kalpaneti |
T11n2992u_001:1957: atra gobalīvardanyāyena śabdādavagatasya śru- taśabdena pṛthagupādānād dṛṣṭaśabdaḥ pramāṇāntaropalabdhe vartate |
T11n2992u_001:1959: gṛhādarśanena bahirbhā- vasyeti jīvato devadattasya gṛhādarśanamabhāvapramāṇopalabdhaṁ bahirbhāva- mantareṇa nopapadyata ityarthaḥ ||
T11n2992u_001:1960: atra yadi jīvato devadattasya gṛhādarśanaṁ bahirbhāvādanyathā na dṛ- śyata ityanyathā nopapadyata ityucyate evaṁ sati bahirbhāvāavinābhūta- mapi tan na dṛṣṭamiti tathāpi nopapadyate |
T11n2992u_001:1961: atha jīvato devadattasya gṛ- hādarśanaṁ bahirbhāva eva sati dṛṣṭaṁ tadabhāve ca na dṛṣṭamityanyathā nopapa- dyata ityabhidhīyate tadā tadbhāvabhāvitvamevānyathānupapannatvamuktaṁ syā- t |
T11n2992u_001:1963: prayogas tu- upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto gṛhe na dṛśyate jīvati ca sa bahir bhavati |
T11n2992u_001:1965: yathoktadharmakaś ca śabdāvagatasattāko devadatta iti svabhāvaḥ ||
T11n2992u_001:1967: yat saṁśayakāraṇam na tat pramāṇam prameyatvavat |
T11n2992u_001:1970: na hi gehe'bhāvamātreṇa caitrasya bahirbhāvapratītir bhavati anyathā śaśaviṣāṇasyāpi syāt |
T11n2992u_001:1971: geha- śabdas tu tatra vākye prayuktas tasya bahirbhāvaṁ gamayati ||
T11n2992u_001:1972: gehaśabdasya prayoge hi vākyametan niyamavantamabhāvaṁ khyāpayati tathāvidhārthavivakṣāyāmevaivaṁvidhavākyaprayogāt |
T11n2992u_001:1973: yadāha- yadi tu gehe bahiś ca na syāt nāstītyevocyeteti |
T11n2992u_001:1974: tasmād vākyametadubha- yamākṣipati gehābhāvaṁ ca bahirbhāvaṁ ca ekasyāpi niyamayogakhyāpa- kasya dvitīyākṣepanāntarīyakatvāt |
T11n2992u_001:1975: na tu kevalo'bhāvo bahirbhāvamā- kṣipati niyamavāṁś ca na kevalaḥ niyamasyobhayarūpatvāt |
T11n2992u_001:1976: tasmān nāsti gehe caitra iti nābhava evocyate api tu bahiś ca bhāvaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1978: yathā hi sthālyādikamantareṇa pāka- sya niṣpattir na bhavatīti nāntarīyakatvāt sā tadākṣipati evaṁ pra- tiṣedhaniyamavivakṣāyāṁ gṛhaśabdasya prayogo bahirbhāvamantareṇa na bhava- tīti nāntarīyakatvāt sa tamākṣipati |
T11n2992u_001:1979: tataś ca yathā pacatiḥ sthā- lyāder liṅgam evamevaṁvidhavākyasamavāyī gehaśabdo'pi bahirbhāva- syeti tata eva tadgatiḥ ||
T11n2992u_001:1980: (127) śabaras tvāha - abhāvo'pi pramāṇābhāvo nāstītyarthasyāsannikṛ- ṣṭasyeti |
T11n2992u_001:1983: tamevānye'nupalabdhiśabdena vyapadiśantaḥ pramāṇāntaravādina ā- huḥ- upalabdhyā yayā yo'rtho jñāyate tadabhāvataḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1987: atha grahaṇāpekṣaḥ sa vastvabhāvagrahaṇe vyāpriyate anavasthā syāt |
T11n2992u_001:1988: yathā hi ghaṭābhāvaḥ pramāṇābhāvena gṛhyate tathā pramāṇābhāvo'pyapare- ṇa so'pyapareṇetyanavasthitiḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1989: ekasyāpi cāgrahaṇe sarveṣāmagrahaṇa- miti kutas tasya prāmāṇyam |
T11n2992u_001:1990: agṛhītasyāpīndriyavad grahaṇakāra- ṇatvaṁ syāditi cet na abhāvasya sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇatvāt |
T11n2992u_001:1991: (128) anyathā bhāva eva syāt arthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇatvād bhāvasyeti nābhāvaḥ pramāṇam ||
T11n2992u_001:1992: tavāpi tarhyanupalabdhir na syāt pramāṇaṁ yathoktādeva doṣāt |
T11n2992u_001:1993: naita- dasti na hi mayaivaṁvidhānupalabdhiriṣyate api tu upalabdhilakṣaṇa- prāptasyānupalabdhiḥ |
T11n2992u_001:1994: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirupalambhapratyayāntarasāka- lyaṁ svabhāvaviśeṣaś ca yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati
T11n2992u_001:1995: tatropalabdhiḥ kartṛsthā vā kriyā syāt karmasthā vā |
T11n2992u_001:1998: yadā tu karmasthā kriyopalabdhiśabdenocyate tadopalabhyamānasyaiva dharmaḥ svaviṣayajñānajananayogyatālakṣaṇa upalabdhir viṣayasvabhāva eva yogyatāyā bhāvarūpatvāt |
T11n2992u_001:2000: sa cāyaṁ yathopavarṇito dviprakāro'pya- nupalambhaḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva sidhyatīti nāsmākaṁ yathoktadoṣasambhavaḥ ||
T11n2992u_001:2007: anyathā yadyanupalabdhisiddha eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt evaṁ sati yathā ghaṭābhāvo dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate tathā dṛṣṭānto'pi nirupākhyaṁ vyomakusumādyapareṇa dṛṣṭāntena sādhyeta |
T11n2992u_001:2009: atha dṛṣṭānto dṛṣṭāntena vināpi sidhyati ghaṭābhāvo'pi sidhyet |
T11n2992u_001:2010: tataś ca pramāṇāntaramevānupala- bdhiḥ syāt dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṇāditi ||
T11n2992u_001:2016: sā svasannidhā- nāt svanimittamenaṁ sādhayatīti svanimittasāmagrībhāvī sarve'tra dṛ- ṣṭāntaḥ |
T11n2992u_001:2017: sadvyavahārapratiṣedhe'pi sādhye dṛśyānupalabdhyetarayā ca ni- mittavaikalyābhāvino'ṅkurādayo'pi dṛṣṭāntaḥ na kevalaṁ nirupākhya- meveti na pramāṇāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ ||
T11n2992u_001:2018: kiṁ punaḥ kāraṇamabhāva eva na sādhyate |
T11n2992u_001:2020: tathā hi- upalabdhireva dṛśyātmanāṁ sattā anupalabdhiś cāsattā |
T11n2992u_001:2022: (130) yadā tāvad yathoktā svaviṣayajñānajananayogyatopalabdhiḥ tadā yo- gyatāyāḥ svabhāvabhūtatvādupalabdhiḥ satteti siddhametat |
T11n2992u_001:2023: yadāpi kartṛ- dharmo jñānamupalabdhiḥ tadāpi sā dṛśyasyārthasya sattānibandhanatvāt tadvyāptyavyatirekābhyāṁ tatsvabhāvāviśiṣṭeti sattāvadupacārāt sattaiva |
T11n2992u_001:2028: tasmān nimittopadarśanena nāstītya- nupalabdherasadvyavahāraḥ sādhyate muḍhaṁ prati jananakhyātyā pitṛtvavat |
T11n2992u_001:2031: yaduktaṁ bhāṣyakāreṇa - parapakṣapra- tiṣedhena svapakṣasiddhiriti tatpratiṣedhaḥ sāṅkhyīyāvītapratiṣedhādeva kṛto veditavyaḥ ayamapyāvītaprayoga eveti kṛtveti ||
